post:
[Evolution Host](https://evolution-host.com) are offering a premium VPS free of charge to users with a popular website in exchange for small text-based backlinks. There is no hard stock limit for this offer. The requirements will be listed at the bottom of the post.

**VPS Specifications**  
• 4 vCPU Cores  
• 4GB RAM  
• 60GB SSD Storage  
• 200Mbps port  
• Advanced DDoS Protection  
• KVM Virtualization  
• France, Canada or USA locations  
• Multiple Linux OS  
These specifications can be improved for websites which would require more resources.

**Offer Requirements/Details**    
• A relatively popular website.  
• A link to the [Evolution Host website](https://evolution-host.com) in a section of your site that appears on all pages.  
• An occasional brief mention on your site.  
• Linux OS. **Windows not included**.  

**How to apply**  
E-mail marketing@evolution-host.com a link to your website. Proof of ownership will be required if your application is accepted.

_Not all applications will be accepted, only ones which meet the criteria we are looking for._
